mapper.select: SELECT user_id, u.email AS email, password, TO_CHAR(regdate,'yy-mm-dd') as regdate, authority FROM imsure_users u LEFT OUTER JOIN imsure_user_role r on u.email = r.email WHERE u.email = #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO imsure_users(user_id, email, password) VALUES ((SELECT user_id_function FROM dual), #{email}, #{password})

INSERT INTO imsure_email_validations (validation_id, user_id, validation_number, type) VALUES ((SELECT validation_id_function FROM dual), (SELECT NVL(MAX(user_id), 1) FROM imsure_users), #{validationNumber}, #{type})
